resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81565</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81565</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>7660</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Our Planet in Space</string>
            <string language="es">Nuestro planeta en el espacio</string>
            <string language="ga">Ár bPlainéad sa Spás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unser Planet im Platz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notre planète dans l'espace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nosso planeta no espaço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il nostro pianeta nello spazio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο πλανήτης μας στο διάστημα</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Pupils will show an understanding of planet Earth, the role of the sun and the other parts of the solar system. Pupils will be able to name some of neighbours in space.</string>
            <string language="es">Los alumnos comprenderán el concepto del planeta Tierra, el papel del sol y las otras partes del sistema solar. Los alumnos podrán nombrar algunos vecinos en el espacio.</string>
            <string language="ga">Taispeánfaidh daltaí tuiscint ar an Domhan, rólna gréine agus na píosaí eile de chóras na gréine. Beidh daltaí ábalta roinnt d’ár gcomharsana sa spás a ainmniú.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía SESE</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pupillen zeigen ein Verständnis von Planet Masse,
die Rolle der Sonne und die anderen Teile des Solarsystems. 
Pupillen können, einige von Nachbarn im Platz zu benennen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pupilles montreront un arrangement de la terre
de planète, le rôle du soleil et les autres parties du système 
solaire. Les pupilles pourront nommer certains de voisins dans 
l'espace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas mostrarão uma compreensão da terra do
planeta, o papel do sol e as outras partes do sistema solar. As 
pupilas poderão  nomear alguns dos vizinhos no espaço.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille mostreranno una comprensione della 
terra del pianeta, il ruolo del sole e le altre parti del sistema 
solare. Le pupille potranno chiamare alcuni dei vicini 
nello spazio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές θα εμφανίσουν μια κατανόηση της γης 
πλανητών, το ρόλο του ήλιου και άλλα μέρη του ηλιακού 
συστήματος. Οι μαθητές θα είναι σε θέση να ονομάσουν 
μερικών από τους γείτονες στο διάστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géographie de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geografia de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Geografia di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωγραφία SESE</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>7660</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <language>en</language>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">11-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>assessment</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Scoilnet;
FN:Scoilnet
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>540</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
